news.title: David Ellison Takes Dig At "Monopolistic" Netflix In UK Open Letter
news.description: David Ellison has written to the UK creative community, committing to investment and theatrical windows as Paramount pursues Warner Bros. Discovery.

news.title: Gold and silver prices after historic sell-off: What's next
news.description: Gold and silver are showing tentative signs of recovery after an intense sell-off. Here's where investment banks see the metals going.

news.title: NYPD officer shoots mentally ill man with knife in Queens apartment
news.description: NYPD bodycam footage shows an officer shooting a man who allegedly charged with a knife during what family says was a mental health episode, renewing debate over how police respond to those calls.

news.title: Ex-Celtics Coach 'Embarrassed' By Rockets' Disastrous Loss To Boston
news.description: Houston Rockets head coach Ime Udoka was ashamed of his team's awful performance against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday.

news.title: Edge Chips in Japan in Win for Takaichi
news.description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. plans to make advanced 3-nanometer chips in Japan, stepping up its semiconductor manufacturing roadmap in the country in a triumph for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s technology ambitions.

news.title: US man shares clever AirTag trick that Apple never explains when you buy it
news.description: US tech creator reveals a simple AirTag setup trick Apple doesn’t explain, plus a small habit that makes trackers far more useful day to day

news.title: ICE can't make warrantless arrests in Oregon unless there's risk of escape, judge rules
news.description: U.S. immigration agents in Oregon must stop arresting people without warrants unless there's a likelihood of escape, a federal judge ruled Wednesday.

news.title: Top NHL Draft prospect Gavin McKenna charged with felony aggravated assault
news.description: McKenna, who turned 18 on Dec. 20, is also facing a misdemeanor assault charge and summary charges of harassment and disorderly conduct.

news.title: Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase Announced For Today, 5th February 2026
news.description: Howdy, partners! - Update: Today's the day, Partners! You'll find everything you need to know about today's Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase in the post belo...

news.title: Cavs clobber Clippers, 124-91, in ‘weird’ game with Darius Garland seated courtside
news.description: The Cavs have won nine of their last 11 games. They are now fourth in the Eastern Conference — and look primed to continue this ascension, especially given this week’s roster enhancements.
